decks.notes: The deck focuses on using a combination of removal spells and counterspells to control the game and disrupt the opponent's strategy. It also utilizes card advantage and card selection through cards like Brainstorm and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student. The win condition is to either outvalue the opponent with cards like Murktide Regent and Baleful Strix, or to use Kaito, Bane of Nightmares and Flame of Anor to finish off the game. Additionally, the deck includes land disruption with cards like Wasteland to further control the opponent's resources.

This deck focuses on utilizing the powerful Doomsday combo to win the game quickly by stacking the top of the library with key cards like Thassa's Oracle. It includes various cantrips and control elements to help manipulate the cards in hand and ensure the combo can be executed efficiently. With access to powerful spells like Force of Will and Brainstorm, the deck can disrupt opponents while setting up its win condition. The combination of fast mana, disruption, and a compact win condition makes this deck a potent threat in the Legacy 1 vs 1 format.

This Eldrazi Aggro deck focuses on overwhelming the opponent with powerful Eldrazi creatures like Reality Smasher and Thought-Knot Seer. The deck utilizes cards like Eye of Ugin and Chalice of the Void to accelerate its game plan and disrupt the opponent's strategy. With a mix of aggressive creatures and disruptive elements like Wasteland and Kozilek's Command, this deck aims to quickly close out games and outpace its opponents in the Legacy format. Overall, this deck thrives on aggression and efficiency to dominate the battlefield.

The deck aims to quickly ramp up mana and cheat big, powerful creatures like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath into play using cards like Show and Tell and Omniscience. It also utilizes counter spells like Force of Will and Daze to protect its combo. The deck's strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with massive threats that are difficult to deal with, while also having some disruptive elements and card draw to maintain its consistency and control the game.

The deck focuses on utilizing a mix of counterspells, removal, and card advantage to control the game and disrupt the opponent's strategy. It also includes ramp spells to accelerate into powerful threats like Scion of Draco and Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath. The deck aims to outvalue the opponent through efficient card draw and versatile answers, while leveraging Leyline of the Guildpact to further control the board. The mana base is designed to support the diverse color requirements of the spells in the deck.

The main idea of the deck is to disrupt the opponent's game plan while deploying efficient threats to apply pressure. By utilizing cards like Thoughtseize, Daze, and Force of Will to disrupt the opponent's strategy, the deck aims to clear the path for aggressive creatures like Kaito, Bane of Nightmares, Nethergoyf, and Orcish Bowmasters to quickly close out the game. The tempo aspect of the deck is key, as it looks to establish an early advantage and maintain control of the game throughout.

The main concept of this UWx Control Legacy deck is to establish control over the game through various counterspells and removal spells while also utilizing card advantage and selection through draw spells like Brainstorm and Ponder. It aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while maintaining its own board presence with versatile threats like Snapcaster Mage and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student. The deck also incorporates strong sideboard options like Back to Basics and Prismatic Ending to further enhance its control elements and adapt to different matchups.

The main concept of this deck is to apply early pressure and disruption through efficient creatures like Delver of Secrets and Dragon's Rage Channeler, supported by powerful instant and sorcery spells. The deck aims to control the board with counterspells like Force of Will and removal like Lightning Bolt, while also utilizing cantrips like Brainstorm and Ponder to dig for key cards. By utilizing a mix of aggressive threats and disruption, the deck seeks to quickly close out the game before the opponent can stabilize.

This Grixis Control deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan with a mix of counterspells, removal spells, and hand disruption. It aims to control the game by efficiently dealing with threats, while also utilizing card advantage from cards like Snapcaster Mage and Baleful Strix. The deck also includes versatile threats like Murktide Regent and Brazen Borrower to apply pressure on the opponent. By combining disruption, card advantage, and proactive threats, this deck aims to outmaneuver the opponent and win the game through a combination of attrition and tempo advantage.

The main concept of this Eldrazi Aggro deck is to quickly ramp up mana using cards like Ancient Tomb, Eldrazi Temple, and Lotus Petal to play powerful Eldrazi creatures such as Thought-Knot Seer and Reality Smasher. Chalice of the Void helps to disrupt the opponent's strategy, while cards like Eldrazi Obligator and Glaring Fleshraker provide additional aggression. The deck also utilizes cards like Wasteland to control the opponent's mana base and Cavern of Souls to ensure that Eldrazi spells are uncounterable. This deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with efficient and powerful threats.

The deck focuses on assembling key artifacts such as Urza's Saga, Mystic Forge, and Karn, the Great Creator to generate a powerful combo engine. By utilizing cards like Grim Monolith, Lotus Petal, and Voltaic Key, the deck aims to create a loop where players can continuously cast artifacts from the top of their library with Mystic Forge. With access to powerful artifacts like The One Ring and Planar Nexus, along with disruptive cards like Pithing Needle and Portable Hole, the deck looks to control the game and overwhelm opponents with its combo potential.

This deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy while maintaining control of the game tempo. By combining hand disruption spells like Thoughtseize with counterspells like Force of Will, along with removal spells like Fatal Push, the deck aims to keep the opponent on the back foot. The creatures in the deck, such as Brazen Borrower and Nethergoyf, provide additional threats while Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student helps filter through the deck for key cards. The land base includes fetch lands like Polluted Delta and Underground Sea for mana fixing and Wasteland for disruption.

The main concept of this deck is to generate a large amount of mana quickly through cards like Dark Ritual, Lotus Petal, and Mox Opal, in order to cast multiple spells in a single turn. The deck aims to assemble a combo using cards like Burning Wish to search for key pieces like Tendrils of Agony or Galvanic Relay, which can lead to a win condition by dealing a large amount of damage to the opponent in a single turn. By using cards like Young Pyromancer and Echo of Eons for value and card draw, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with its fast and powerful combo potential.

This deck focuses on assembling a powerful artifact combo using Mystic Forge and cards like Manifold Key and Basalt Monolith to generate infinite mana and loop through the deck with The One Ring. Karn, the Great Creator and Tezzeret, Cruel Captain are key pieces in finding and utilizing the combo pieces effectively. The deck also utilizes cards like Urza's Saga and Urza's Workshop to quickly search for key artifacts and overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats like Glaring Fleshraker.

Utilizing a Legendary creature as a companion, this deck focuses on aggressive strategies with a Death & Taxes archetype. The deck includes powerful removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and a strong equipment package with Stoneforge Mystic. With a mix of disruptive creatures like Containment Priest and Spirit of the Labyrinth, as well as efficient beaters like Solitude and Kaldra Compleat, the deck aims to disrupt opponents while applying pressure on the board. The deck's mana denial plan is supported by cards like Wasteland and Rishadan Port, alongside protection and evasion from Mother of Runes and Flickerwisp.

This Mono Black Aggro deck focuses on quickly building a board presence and pressuring the opponent with aggressive creatures like Phoenix Fleet Airship, Gravecrawler, and Overlord of the Balemurk. The deck also includes disruption spells like Cabal Therapy and Thoughtseize to control the opponent's hand and Flare of Malice to deal direct damage. The inclusion of creatures like Marionette Apprentice and Warren Soultrader provide additional utility and potential for explosive plays. The mana base is designed to support the deck's aggressive strategy while also providing access to necessary colors for spells.
